title: F1 2017 – v1.13 + DLC
body:
F1 2017 – v1.13 + DLC


Genres/Tags: Racing, Simulation, 3D, Open-wheel cars
Company: Codemasters
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 34.3 GB
Repack Size: from 12.4 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Good Old Downloads (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on F1 2017 v1.13 Steam release: 31.4 GB
  • Missing languages added
  • F1.2017.Update.V1.13.Crack.Only-Voksi (98 MB) applied over
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • 1988 McLAREN MP4/4 CLASSIC CAR DLC included and activated
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of credits video and language packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 34.3 to 12.4~15.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~15 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~25 minutes on 4-threads CPU; ~40 minutes on 2-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 34 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • If the game crashes for you with Denuvo error, just relaunch it. The sibilant sound during race can be fixed by double alt+tabbing

Game Description

Win the 2017 World Championship, break every record in the fastest ever F1 cars, and race some of the most iconic F1 cars of the last 30 years. With an even deeper ten year Career, more varied gameplay in the new ‘Championships’ mode, and a host of other new features, both online and offline, F1 2017 is the most complete and thrilling F1 videogame ever.

F1 2017 gives the player unprecedented access to not only the on-track excitement of F1, but also the off-track dealings and vehicle development that goes along with it. The acclaimed career mode is updated to include additional practice programmes to help the driver hone their skills, an expanded Research and Development tree to provide greater depth and control over the development of the car, and the ability to manage engines and gearboxes over the course of the season.

Along with some stunning new locations and compelling characters to interact with, these enhancements all combine to provide the most complete experience in the world of F1 yet.

You can skip downloading of credits video and language files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-credits.bin (Staff Roll Video)
  • fg-selective-english.bin (REQUIRED for English, Russian, Polish & Simplified Chinese users)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-06).

This repack is partially backwards compatible with my previous F1 2017 repack. The following files can be rehashed to save you up to 3 GB of traffic:

  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
